about_the_game:
Welcome to Tilted Tennis, a competitive paddle ball game where the camera moves and spins with the ball!

Disorient Your Friends

Play with or against your friends, spin the ball as you hit it towards their goal to try and catch them off guard and win the match. But be prepared to get disoriented yourself as you have to keep track of which way is up if you want to defend your goal.

A Variety of Maps to Choose From

We have many styles of maps available for play, from air hockey to volleyball style, featuring different configurations for 1-4 players and beyond, including team based maps and solo practice maps.

Custom Map Support

If you can't find what you're looking for, you can build your own map too! Our built-in map editor will let your make the custom map of your dreams. Not the creative type? That's okay! You can download maps from other users off of the steam workshop.


Online and Local Play

Play with your friends locally! Play with your friends over the internet! Play with some friends locally, and others over the internet! Our flexible lobby system will allow you to play the way you want to play. Including LAN and UPnP lobbies for potential cross-platform play.

Rollback Netcode

Utilizing rollback technology, in Tilted Tennis you'll get a near seamless online play experience. Neither you nor your friends will experience input latency while your connection is stable.

name: Tilted Tennis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A competitive paddle and ball game, with a twist! As you hit the ball around the arena, the camera follows it. Spin the ball to disorient your friends and win the match, but take care not to lose track of which way is up yourself...
